name: Hal and O.A.F.
description:
Welcome to 2052.  Hal is a private investigator.  O.A.F. is a factory-robot reprogrammed for private investigations.  They're ready to hang up their investigator hats so they can open a pizza shop, but they need to wrap-up a case first.

Guide Hal and O.A.F. through their last case:

  • Fight or talk your way past unsavory folks.
  • Discover more about what's happening in the investigation.
  • Eat pizza.
Controls:
  • Keyboard Controls
    • General
      • Esc - Options (in game only)
    • Character
      • W, Up Arrow - Hug wall / Dodge
      • A, Left Arrow - Move Left
      • S, Down Arrow - Roll
      • D, Right Arrow - Move Right
      • E - Use/Unlock Door
      • Q - O.A.F. Special
      • Space - Shoot
      • 1 - Change to Unarmed
      • 2 - Change to Flashlight
      • 3 - Change to Handgun
      • 4 - Eat Pizza (regain health)
      • Tab - Cycle Unarmed/Flashlight/Handgun
    • Dialogue
      • W | Up Arrow,  S | Down Arrow - Change selection
      • Enter - Use selected dialog response
      • Space - Speed up text
  • Controller
    • General
      • Start - Options (in game only)
    • Character
      • Up - Hug wall / Dodge (D-Pad or Analog Stick 1)
      • Left - Move Left
      • Down - Roll
      • Right - Move Right
      • A/RT - Shoot
      • B - Eat Pizza (regain health)
      • Y - Use/Unlock Door
      • X - O.A.F. Special
      • RB - Cycle Unarmed/Flashlight/Handgun (forward)
      • LB - Cycle Unarmed/Flashlight/Handgun (backward)
      • Start - Options
    • Dialogue
      • Up | Down - Change selection
      • A - Use selected dialog response
      • B - Speed up text
